title: Remember when you played against Yasuo for the first time?
body: I was in top lane as Ryze, and I was running away from Yasuo because I went in for a bad trade. Suddenly he was using the creeps to catch up to me. I remember thinking, "Certainly that spell is going to go on cooldown soon." As he proceeded to go through a minion for the fifth time, I was just stuck. Glued to my chair, not even mad that I died, because of how hilarious that chase was.
